Wakefield Prototype Documentation

Prototype for the Implementation of Wakefield in Opal

This prototype is used to test the implementation of wakefield without opal.

To start that project call make in the main folder. This will generate a serie of wakefield with diffrent parameters, and calculate the resulting kick for the particles with a given bunch linedistribution. The bunch linedistribution can be changed in the profile.h file.

fftw3 must be installed

Developed by Stefan Pauli.

For further information contact: paulist@student.ethz.ch - Stefan Pauli
